note:
Not the most active of writers, but an avid reader/consumer of tech things.

My first computer was an Amiga 500 and found the demo scene via BBSs, upgraded to an Amiga 3000, ran a BBS in Melbourne Aus.

Installed Linux from a Redhat 5.0 box set in 1997.

I am amazed at the things people with imagination can do with hardware and software.

I have little to say.

My new thing to learn is riding a motorbike. I might mention that... :)
